verbs.description: investors [V: can] enjoy a tax savings on advisor fees by using this strategy the new federal tax law ends deductions on some types of advisory fees including those based on the value of assets under management but the irs has long held that qualified retirement accounts can pay their own expenses as funds in these accounts are tax - deferred there are no tax consequences to using this money to pay advisory fees related to the management of these accounts congress investment company institute irs tax investment company institute advisor
